high_level_goal: Rebuild the /quote calculator with comprehensive inputs, pricing logic, and booking form

inputs.description: Complete rebuild of the quote/booking calculator per detailed specification. Must have proper inputs, team recommendation logic, price computation, and booking form.

PRICING_CONFIG.note: ALL VALUES ARE NOW CONFIRMED - see quote-config.js for full implementation

TEAM_HEURISTIC.not_sure_default: 1 team + show 'We'll confirm scope on a 10-minute call.'

subtasks.title: Update quote-config.js with proper structure
subtasks.details: Create config with: base (price: 7500, hours: 8, teams: 1), extra_hour_price, extra_team_price, travel (included_miles, per_mile, minimum), night_ops_fee, deposit (enabled, percent). Use placeholder values for TBD items.

subtasks.title: REQUIRED INPUTS section
subtasks.details: Event location (address + city/state + zip), Event date, Start time and end time (calculate total hours), Event type dropdown (used for risk heuristic), Estimated attendance, Site size with 3 options: Acres (number input), Perimeter length (feet/meters/miles), 'Not sure' (defaults to 1 team)

subtasks.title: OPTIONAL INPUTS section
subtasks.details: Risk level: Low/Medium/High/'Let SkyShield decide', Night ops: Yes/No, Airspace uncertainty: 'Near airport/downtown' Yes/No, Multi-day: number of days, Client radio channel available: Yes/No, Travel: distance from Austin (or manual miles input)

subtasks.title: Team recommendation logic
subtasks.details: Implement heuristic: Low risk = 1 team per 6 acres, Medium = 1 team per 4 acres, High = 1 team per 3 acres. Formula: recommended_teams = ceil(acres / threshold). If 'Not sure' selected, default to 1 team and show message.

subtasks.title: Price computation
subtasks.details: base = 7500, extra_hours = max(0, hours - 8), extra_teams = max(0, teams - 1). total = (base + extra_hours * EXTRA_HOUR_PRICE + extra_teams * EXTRA_TEAM_PRICE + travel_fee + night_fee + addons) * days. For TBD values, show 'Starting at $7,500' or range.

subtasks.title: OUTPUT display - Primary
subtasks.details: Show: Estimated total price (or 'Starting at $X'), Recommended coverage package, Teams (integer), Hours, Fleet per team: '3× DJI Matrice 4T (2 airborne + 1 hot spare)', Staff per team: '2 Part 107 pilots + 1 Ops Manager'

subtasks.title: OUTPUT display - Breakdown
subtasks.details: Line items: Base package (8 hours, 1 team), Additional hours, Additional teams, Travel/mobilization (if applicable), Night ops add-on (if applicable). Show 'Deposit' line if enabled.

subtasks.title: OUTPUT display - Always Included
subtasks.details: Always show: Live overwatch + radio callouts, Incident Log, Safety Receipt PDF within 24 hours, Privacy: no biometric ID or ALPR by default

subtasks.title: Disclaimers and banners
subtasks.details: Under price show: 'Final quote depends on site layout, airspace approvals, and operational constraints (Part 107/VLOS/venue permissions).' If near airport/downtown selected, show: 'This location may require airspace authorization. We'll confirm before finalizing.'

subtasks.title: Booking form payload
subtasks.details: Collect: Contact (name, email, phone), Event (date, start/end, type, attendance), Location (address), Scope (acres/perimeter, risk, night ops, days), Calculator result (teams, hours, price, breakdown), Notes (free text). Submit to mailto or form handler.

deliverables: Updated info/quote-config.js with proper config structure
Team recommendation logic based on acres/risk
Booking form with all required fields

notes_from_legate: This is the key conversion page. The locked price is $7,500 base for 8 hours with 1 team. Everything else (extra hours, teams, travel, night) is TBD - implement as editable config constants. For TBD pricing, show 'Starting at $7,500' and push to 'Request booking'. Fleet is 3× Matrice 4T per team. Staff is 2 pilots + 1 ops manager per team. Keep UX clean and don't make promises about pricing we haven't confirmed.
